message: Hi Bob, I have an excellent product that I believe will meet your needs. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1200000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product's value, but my budget is a bit tight. Would you consider selling it for $1000000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. Considering the value and quality of the product, I can lower my initial offer a bit. How about $1100000? I believe it's a fair price for both of us.
